channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Zelenskyy asks Trump for 50 years of security guarantees, says meeting with Russia possible
item.description: Ukraine's president, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, said Monday that he had asked for security guarantees for up to 50 years for Ukraine.

item.title: These stocks have fallen hard in 2025. Analysts are gauging their 2026 upsides.
Warren Buffett hands off Berkshire’s reins this week. He leaves 5 parting gifts.
Economic calendar: Week kicks off with pending-home-sales and home-price reports
Ten ideas that could really help solve America’s affordability crisis in 2026
This silver-tracking ETF is having its worst trading session since 2020
Trump says ‘a lot closer’ to Ukraine peace deal after Zelenskyy meeting, though thorny issues remain
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was scheduled to arrive at Mar-a-Lago in President Donald Trump's latest attempt to end the war with Russia.

item.title: Zelenskyy meets Trump in Florida for talks on Ukraine peace plan
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump met in Florida on Sunday to try to forge a plan to end the war in Ukraine.

item.title: Russian drones, missiles pound Ukraine ahead of Trump-Zelenskyy meeting
item.description: The latest strikes came less than 48 hours after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy signaled that a peace deal was close.

item.title: The 'Trump-class' battleship faces a large obstacle in its way: Reality
item.description: Even if it were technically feasible, the cost of building the battleship would be prohibitive.
